members.name: Dynamic
members.description: When 1, mesh is in bind pose; when 0, it isn't. Most likely has further implications.

members.name: Material Index
members.description: Index of the material used by all triangles in this mesh.

members.name: Default Bone Index
members.description: Apparently does nothing. Usually points to a dummy bone named after the model, possibly just for labelling.

members.name: Bone Indices
members.description: Indexes of bones in the bone collection which may be used by vertices in this mesh.

members.name: Face Sets
members.description: Triangles in this mesh.

members.name: Vertex Buffers
members.description: Vertex buffers in this mesh.

members.name: Vertices
members.description: Vertices in this mesh.

members.name: Vertex Count
members.description: The number of vertices in this mesh.

members.name: Triangle Strip
members.description: Whether vertices are defined as a triangle strip or individual triangles.

members.name: Cull Backfaces
members.description: Whether triangles can be seen through from behind.

members.name: Indices Count
members.description: The number of indices this face set has.

members.name: Layout Index
members.description: Index to a layout in the FLVER's layout collection.

members.name: Name
members.description: Corresponds to the name of a bone in the parent skeleton. May also have a dummy name.

members.name: Parent Index
members.description: Index of the parent in this FLVER's bone collection, or -1 for none.

members.name: Child Index
members.description: Index of the first child in this FLVER's bone collection, or -1 for none.

members.name: Next Sibling Index
members.description: Index of the next child of this bone's parent, or -1 for none.

members.name: Previous Sibling Index
members.description: Index of the previous child of this bone's parent, or -1 for none.

members.name: Translation
members.description: Translation of this bone.

members.name: Rotation
members.description: Rotation of this bone; euler radians.

members.name: Scale
members.description: Scale of this bone.

members.name: Bounding Box: Minimum
members.description: Minimum extent of the vertices weighted to this bone.

members.name: Bounding Box: Maximum
members.description: Maximum extent of the vertices weighted to this bone.

members.name: Unknown
members.description: Unknown; only 0 or 1 before Sekiro.

members.name: Position
members.description: Location of the dummy point.

members.name: Forward
members.description: Vector indicating the dummy point's forward direction.

members.name: Upward
members.description: Vector indicating the dummy point's upward direction.

members.name: Reference ID
members.description: Indicates the type of dummy point this is (hitbox, sfx, etc).

members.name: Bone Index
members.description: Presumably the index of a bone the dummy points would be listed under in an editor. Not known to mean anything ingame.

members.name: Bone Index
members.description: Presumably the index of a bone the dummy points would be listed under in an editor. Not known to mean anything ingame.

members.name: Attach Bone Index
members.description: Index of the bone that the dummy point follows physically.

members.name: Use Upward Vector
members.description: If false, the upward vector is not read.

members.name: Unk30
members.description: Unknown; only used in Sekiro.

members.name: Unk34
members.description: Unknown; only used in Sekiro.

members.name: Terminator ID
members.description: Value indicating the terminating item; typically int.MaxValue, sometimes -1.

members.name: Terminator Length
members.description: The length in bytes of the terminator data block; most likely not important, but varies in original files.

members.name: ID
members.description: In DS2, ID is just a number; in other games, it's 4 ASCII characters.

members.name: Unk04
members.description: Unknown; typically 100.

members.name: Data
members.description: Raw parameter data, usually just a bunch of floats.

members.name: Name
members.description: Identifies the mesh that uses this material, may include keywords that determine hideable parts.

members.name: Material Path
members.description: Virtual path to an MTD file.

members.name: Textures
members.description: Textures used by this material.

members.name: GX Index
members.description: Index to the flver's list of GX lists.

members.name: Type
members.description: The type of texture this is, corresponding to the entries in the MTD.

members.name: Path
members.description: Network path to the texture file to use.

members.name: Shader Path
members.description: Network path to the shader source file.

members.name: Source Path
members.description: Network path to the material source file, either a matxml or an mtd.

members.name: Key
members.description: Unknown, presumed to be an identifier for documentation.
